markdownRemark.html:
While having some problems with my ketogenic diet & pancit for almost a whole day, I realized that since I have the capacity now to be stable in Cayman Islands… I should do more focused writing projects - like the book I’m thinking a lot of writing and topics that I quite need to understand more… like how our body functions with hormones (dopamine, cortisol, seratonin etc..) and how it affects our thinking and health in general. Climate adaptation can be another series.

Still I’m learning how to learn fast & effective while sorting out my responsibilities for my family in the Philippines and for myself..

I’ll start with the hormone seratonin next blog.
